keyword: calories in a ham sandwich with cheese
title: Calories in a Ham Sandwich with Cheese
meta_description: Discover calories in a ham sandwich with cheese, including full nutrition breakdown, protein, carbs, fat, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: Calories in a Ham Sandwich with Cheese
assumptions: 2 slices white bread, 3 oz deli ham, 1 oz cheddar cheese, 1 tsp mustard; no mayo or veggies.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bread type, ham brand, cheese amount, and added condiments. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard ham sandwich with cheese contains about 350 kcal, 20 g protein, and 40 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use whole wheat bread instead of white

faqs.q: How many calories in a ham sandwich with cheese?
faqs.a: Approximately 350 kcal for a standard version with 2 slices bread, 3 oz ham, and 1 oz cheese.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a ham and cheese sandwich?
faqs.a: About 20 g protein, mostly from the ham and cheese.

faqs.q: Does a ham sandwich with cheese have a lot of sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 1200 mg due to processed ham and cheese.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in a ham sandwich with cheese?
faqs.a: Opt for low-fat cheese, turkey ham, or whole grain bread to reduce by 20-100 kcal.

faqs.q: Are carbs high in a ham and cheese sandwich?
faqs.a: Yes, about 40 g carbs, primarily from the bread.
